ygData.subject: Re: Experience and Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thats the right attitude to have.  I have never been in a situation where a unique item has dropped that I could use for my twink.  However, I know that if
ygData.messageBody:
> Michael DuBois wrote:
>
> From: Michael DuBois <mdubois@...>
>
> Cut the flame war guys, please..
>
> I have a twink, so I understand BOTH sides.
>
> The only bad thing that I have seen is this,
> and yes, I have a problem with it and DO NOT
> do this myself..
>
> The problem is when a Primary character is
> winning loots for rare drops for their TWINK
> when a fellow party members' PRIMARY character
> needs the item.
>
> There lies the problem.
>
> My group members ALWAYS come before my twink.
>
> Hiscanth
>
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------
> [ONElist Sponsor]
> Please click above to support our sponsor
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Thats the right attitude to have. I have never been in a situation
where a unique item has dropped that I could use for my twink. However,
I know that if I couldn't use it myself I wouldn't enter the lotto.
--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana

--
Worlord
worlord@...
